statements: DELETE FROM athletes_recovery_data WHERE hydration_level < 50 AND muscle_soreness > 3;
DELETE FROM athlete_performance_data WHERE performance_score > 90 AND performance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM athlete_recovery_data WHERE athlete_id = 100 AND hydration_level > 5;
DELETE FROM athlete_performance_data WHERE performance_score < 80 AND performance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM muscle_soreness_data WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND date = '2022-10-05';
DELETE FROM hydration_data WHERE athlete_id = 2 AND hydration_level = 'low';
DELETE FROM athletes WHERE id = 5 AND age >= 25;
DELETE FROM sleep_quality WHERE athlete_id = 10 AND date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM RecoveryOptimization WHERE athlete_id = 101 AND optimization_date < '2023-01-01';
